phpMyAdmin 嘗試連線到 MySQL 伺服器，但伺服器拒絕連線

  1. Go to: phpmyadmin/config.inc.php
  2. Open with notepad
  3. Configue this line: $cfg['Servers'][$i]['password'] = '';
  4. Consider this: ['password'] = ''; . The quote '' is the place where password should put.
  5. Restart. Now should access.

9-Sep-2015 Question: I want to change homepage in XAMPP -- no more dashboard! Answer:
  1. Find "index.php" in xampphtdocs . In other words, xampphtdocsindex.php .
  2. Find this line: header('Location: '.$uri.'/dashboard/');
  3. Change '/dashboard/' into other link. For example, index.html

item.title: DNS: Cannot slove
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
10-Sep-2015 Question: Consider this:
ping www.iigmir.idv.tw
And this:
nslookup www.iigmir.idv.tw
Why nslookup success to slove when ping fail? Answer: It's because DNS cache hasn't  information about "www.iigmir.idv.tw" yet. What should you do? Easy, just type:
ipconfig /renew
And things go back to what they should.

item.title: W3C: div and span
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Question: Why <span> <h1> this </h1> </span> is unacceptable? Answer: From Stack Overflow:
ul and h5 are block-level elements, but span is an inline element. Inline elements can be placed iside block elements, but block elements cannot be placed in inline elements. The block-level equivalent for span is div. Use a div instead.
So this is acceptable: <h1> <span > Okay </span> </h1> While this is not: <span> <h1> NG </h1> </span> Ref:
  • http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18960581/element-h5-not-allowed-as-child-of-element-span-in-this-context
  • http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_blocks.asp
  • http://codex.wiki/post/115230-644

item.title: PHP: mysqli_query
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Problem: Warning: mysqli_query() expects parameter 1 to be mysqli, string given Action: Order problem. System expects this: mysqli_query($connection,"select * from member where password='$password' AND account_name='$account_name'"); while I type this: mysqli_query("select * from member where password='$password' AND account_name='$account_name'",$connection); Just change sort order, problem slove. Ref:
  • http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13979210/mysqli-select-db-expects-parameter-1-to-be-mysqli-string-given
  • http://php.net/manual/en/mysqli.query.php

item.title: Unable to create directory wp-content/uploads
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Problem: When I try to upload images, gets this error:
Unable to create directory wp-content/uploads/2012/11. Is its parent directory writable by the server?
Action: It must premission problem...but I have no idea. Until I read WordPressPermission, I understand that Apache itself may not have premission to write directory. That is, cannot upload. Therefore, I read httpd.conf to find which account Apache using. It's apache. Let's add apache to our webdev group: sudo gpasswd -a apache webdev And restart Apache. Now it works! I can upload images! Ref:
  • [resolved] Unable to create directory wp-content/uploads
  • WordPressPermission
  • Finding out what user Apache is running as?

item.title: PHP, MySQLi
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
1. mysqli_real_escape_string 用作防止 MySQL 注入。
  2. mysqli_query 用作執行 MySQL 指令。
  3. mysqli_fetch_assoc 把 mysqli_query 變成陣列。通常用在 SELECT 指令。
  4. mysqli_num_rows 把 mysqli_query 的陣列長度算出來。應該也是用在 SELECT 指令吧。
